example_missions.name: E-commerce Product Search
example_missions.goal: Search for 'laptop' and navigate to product details page
example_missions.initial_system_prompt: You are a customer looking for a laptop. Use the search functionality and browse product listings.

example_missions.name: News Site Navigation
example_missions.goal: Navigate to the technology section and read headlines
example_missions.initial_system_prompt: You are browsing news articles. Focus on finding and reading technology headlines.

example_missions.name: Contact Form Testing
example_missions.goal: Find and submit the contact form
example_missions.initial_system_prompt: You need to contact customer support. Find the contact form and fill it out.
